about.preview: I'm Malaika, a front-end developer focusing on clean UI, responsive layouts and accessible code.
about.full: Hello! I'm Malaika Zulqarnain. I create responsive websites and small full-stack projects using modern HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I enjoy making UI that is usable, accessible and attractive.

services.title: Web Design
services.desc: Designing clean, modern interfaces and layouts for websites.

services.title: Front-End Development
services.desc: Building responsive, accessible sites with HTML, CSS and JS.

services.title: UI Prototyping
services.desc: Interactive prototypes to validate UI and flows.

portfolio.title: Responsive Portfolio
